item.description:
I have been here before and the is quite good. I thought we would join the Active Singles group for this event. Plus it is very affordable. They also have a full bar. I will make the reservations in advance and it will be under my name. Doris. If you can't make this event please change your rsvp please. The nice weather will be arriving soon so this is a good time to get together indoors. They accept visa/ mastercard and they will do individual checks. I will be making the reservation next Thursday.

Their phone is 401-723- 6900

See you soon fellow foodies.

FAMILY STYLE DINNER (SUNDAYS & WEDNESDAYS)
Sundays: 12:00 am – 6:00 pm
Wednesdays: 12:00pm – 8:00 pm
ALL YOU CAN EAT
Soup, Pasta, Oven Roasted Potatoes, Salad, Roasted Chicken and Chef's choice of Roasted Sirloin, Baked Ham or Roasted Pork.
ADULTS: 13:50 CHILDREN: 8.95
Sold in 3 Pieces. Leg, Thigh and Breast.
item.name: Banquet Feast All you can eat
